name: Solid + Non-solid Klotski Blocks
author: Alucard648
info: Made on request by SkyFlareUpdate 9.6.2022 -- Added Ice klotski variant with option to bounce off other blocks, like Mulino gameUpdate 15.7.2022 - minor bug fixes
description: Solid and Non-solid Klotski puzzle block.Solid: push like normal large push block.Non-solid Stand on it, face desired direction and press EX1 to move it.Land all colored blocks on the same-colored triggers to solve the puzzle.
setup: Upon compiling, assign 2 FFC scripts,//Solid Klotski blocks. Non-solid Klotski Blocks.Both scripts have the same setup algorithm//Effect Width and Height used and is automatically set to be tile dimensions multiplied by 16.//D0 - bracelet level requirement.//D1 - allowed push directions. Add together - 1-up, 2-down, 4-left, 8-right. 0 for all directions.//D2 - 1 - require same-colord trigger combo for trigger secrets.//D3 - 0 - not count for trigger//D4 - 1 - allow pushing onto same-colored #67 flags, +2 -> Icy variant, continues moving in direction, +4 - bounce off another ice block (non-solid only).
